channel.title: CVE Feed for Weblizar -- The School Management – Education & Learning Management

item.title: CVE-2022-47430|2024-08-03T14:55:07.872Z -- weblizar -- the%20school%20management%20%E2%80%93%20education%20%26%20learning%20management
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Weblizar The School Management – Education & Learning Management allows SQL Injection.This issue affects The School Management – Education & Learning Management: from n/a through 4.1.
